text: I'm sure this already occurred to folks, but there's another way to use [[Spike, Tournament Grinder]] in EDH...it says to put card that has been banned in A Constructed format. Not just EDH. This is another way to get around the singleton rule by grabbing another [[Birthing Pod]], or a [[Green Sun's Zenith]]...
